DataElement.preferredName: Observation Study Protocol Document Healthy Subject Acceptable Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data._An individual who is or becomes a participant in a research study and has no significant health-related issues.:Satisfying an established set of qualifying measures.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Values of two-valued logic.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data.

Concepts.definition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.

Property.preferredDefinition: An individual who is or becomes a participant in a research study and has no significant health-related issues.:Satisfying an established set of qualifying measures.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Satisfying an established set of qualifying measures.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 4/7/11 - no longer used by BRIDG; released for reuse by COPPA

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2/19/13 Added AIM Foundation Model CSI reference. jc
